description: ModSecurity is an open source, cross platform web application firewall (WAF) engine for Apache, IIS and Nginx. It has a robust event-based programming language which provides protection from a range of attacks against web applications and allows for HTTP traffic monitoring, logging and real-time analysis.

Static reflection for enums (to string, from string, iteration) for modern C++, work with any enum type without any macro or boilerplate code

A modern, C++-native, test framework for unit-tests, TDD and BDD - using C++14, C++17 and later (C++11 support is in v2.x branch, and C++03 on the Catch1.x branch)
OpenVINO™ is an open-source toolkit for optimizing and deploying AI inference
